text: Tab Farishton ne ussey kaha ke “aey Lut, hum tere Rubb ke bheje huye Farishtey hain. Yeh log tera kuch na bigad sakenge. Bas tu kuch raat rahey apne ehal o ayal ko lekar nikal jaa aur dekho, tum mein se koi shaks peechey palat kar na dekhey magar teri biwi (saath nahin jayegi) kyunke uspar bhi wahi kuch guzarne wala hai jo in logon par guzarna hai. Unki tabahi ke liye subah ka waqt muqarrar hai. Subah hotey ab dair hi kitni hai”
